H0.text: who has said that caste is a closed class. Herbert Hope Risley

H1.text: who has said that caste is a closed class. Louis Dumont

H2.text: who has said that caste is a closed class. G.S. Ghurye

H3.text: who has said that caste is a closed class. Frederik Barth

A4.text: In caste systems, all aspects of social status are ascribed, such that one's social position at birth persists throughout one's lifetime.

A5.text: Those systems in which there is little to no mobility, even on an intergenerational basis, are considered closed stratification systems.
